in 1974显然是过去,用一般过去时.

因为tell是谓语动词,所以drink是非谓语动词,根据句型ask /tell /want /order sb to do sth可知,用不定式作宾补.
由上文now可知,他现在正在给…浇水,所以用现在进行时态.
由上文问的是即将到来的假日的计划可知,应当用一般将来时.
由is可知Mr. Green现在还在我校教书,又由for five years可知,他从五年前开始一直到现在都在我校教书.表示从过去某一时刻开始一直到现在的动作或状态,要用现在完成时.

question_sets.context:
在下列各句中的空白处填入一个最适当的词,使句子意思完整,语法正确.
1. The film was so <blank> that I fell asleep.
2. I don't like western food. Let's go to a Chinese <blank>.
3. The shop is very crowded, <blank> on Saturday on Sunday.
4. I want to tell you that if you want to keep <blank> , you must give up smoking.
5. The Great Wall <blank> a large number of visitors to China every year.

questions.explanation: The context requires an adjective to describe the film. 'boring' fits well and means uninteresting, causing sleepiness.
The sentence suggests going to a place to eat Chinese food, so 'restaurant' is the appropriate word.
'especially' means particularly or more than usual, fitting the context of crowdedness on weekends.
To maintain good health, quitting smoking is advisable, making 'healthy' the correct word.
The Great Wall draws many visitors to China each year, so 'attracts' is suitable.
